newsitem.title: USA: Nestor sees profitable operations in Q2.
newsitem.headline: Nestor sees profitable operations in Q2.

text.p: Nestor Inc said Friday it should see profitable operations during the second quarter.

The company, which provides decision support solutions for the financial services industry, attributed its outlook to the installation of its PRISM fraud-detection product for Total Systems Services Inc, a credit, debit, commercial and private-label card-processing company serving card issuers in the United States, Canada and Mexico.

"PRISM relationships with Total, Europay, ACI and others are expected to generate significant revenue, which should bring profitable operations during the second quarter," the company said in a release.
Nestor shares closed unchanged Friday at 2-1/8.
